query.main: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(num_obj, "_", type) as num_object, ((cms_editorial_fields_global_index.value like '% !!p!! %')) AS pert FROM cms_editorial_fields_global_index WHERE cms_editorial_fields_global_index.value like '%!!p!!%' ORDER BY pert desc, cms_editorial_fields_global_index.value ASC

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(num_object, "_", type) as num_object FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id_article AS num_object, "article" AS type FROM cms_articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%!!p!!%' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT id_section AS num_object, "section" AS type FROM cms_sections WHERE section_title LIKE '%!!p!!%' ) AS cms_editorial

input.query: SELECT DISTINCT id_editorial_type, editorial_type_label FROM cms_editorial_types ORDER BY editorial_type_label

query.main: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(num_object, "_", type) as num_object FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id_article AS num_object, "article" AS type FROM cms_articles WHERE article_num_type = '!!p!!' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT id_section AS num_object, "section" AS type FROM cms_sections WHERE section_num_type = '!!p!!' ) AS cms_editorial

input.query: SELECT DISTINCT id_publication_state, editorial_publication_state_label FROM cms_editorial_publications_states ORDER BY editorial_publication_state_label

query.main: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(num_object, "_", type) as num_object FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT id_article AS num_object, "article" AS type FROM cms_articles WHERE article_publication_state = '!!p!!' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT id_section AS num_object, "section" AS type FROM cms_sections WHERE section_publication_state = '!!p!!' ) AS cms_editorial

input.query: SELECT DISTINCT id_section, section_title FROM cms_sections ORDER BY section_title

query.main: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(id_article, "_article") as num_object FROM cms_articles WHERE num_section IN (!!p!!)

input.query: SELECT DISTINCT id_section, section_title FROM cms_sections ORDER BY section_title

query.main: SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(id_section, "_section") as num_object FROM cms_sections WHERE section_num_parent IN (!!p!!)

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE !!multiple_term!!

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE !!multiple_term!!

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND cms_editorial_custom_date >= '!!p!!'

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND cms_editorial_custom_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL '!!p!!' DAY)

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND cms_editorial_custom_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL '!!p!!' DAY)

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND WEEK(cms_editorial_custom_date,1) = WEEK(NOW(),1) AND YEAR(cms_editorial_custom_date)

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND MONTH(cms_editorial_custom_date) = MONTH(NOW()) AND YEAR(cms_editorial_custom_date) = YEAR(NOW())

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND PERIOD_DIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT(cms_editorial_custom_date, '%Y%m')) = 1

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND YEAR(cms_editorial_custom_date) = YEAR(NOW())

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND (cms_editorial_custom_date='' or cms_editorial_custom_date='0000-00-00' or cms_editorial_custom_date is null)

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND cms_editorial_custom_date!='' AND cms_editorial_custom_date!=0

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_origine, "_", CASE WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'section%' THEN 'section' WHEN cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element LIKE 'article%' THEN 'article' ELSE cms_editorial_types.editorial_type_element END ) as num_object FROM cms_editorial_custom_values JOIN cms_editorial_custom on cms_editorial_custom.idchamp = cms_editorial_custom_values.cms_editorial_custom_champ JOIN cms_editorial_types on cms_editorial_types.id_editorial_type = cms_editorial_custom.num_type WHERE cms_editorial_custom_champ=!!field!! AND if('!!p!!', cms_editorial_custom_date >= '!!p!!', 1) AND if('!!p1!!', cms_editorial_custom_date <= '!!p1!!', 1)
